From Google Photos-style retouching to cinematic concept art, every idea becomes publish-ready in seconds.

step1.title: Describe Your Vision

step2.title: Pick Mode & Batch Size
step2.description: Select 2K or 4K, enable up to 10 outputs, and decide whether you‚Äôre editing a photo, blending multiple shots, or generating fresh concepts. Nano Banana Pro keeps styles locked in so every batch stays coherent.

step3.title: Iterate in Real Time
step3.description: Use multi-step refinements‚Äî‚Äúadd snowfall,‚Äù ‚Äúmove the camera overhead,‚Äù ‚Äúfix the smile‚Äù‚Äîuntil it‚Äôs perfect. Download instantly with Synth-ID protection and keep iterating inside Nano Banana Pro whenever inspiration strikes.

faq.title: Your Questions, Answered
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about creating with Nano Banana Pro

q1.question: What is Nano Banana Pro and how does it work?
q1.answer: Nano Banana Pro is the upgraded evolution of Google's Nano Banana project. Through our custom interface you can feed prompts, upload photos, or blend multiple references and receive up to 10 Synth-ID-protected outputs in 1-2 seconds. It handles edits, restyles, and brand-new scenes with the same ease.

q2.question: How is this different from Midjourney or DALL-E?
q2.answer: Nano Banana Pro delivers 1-2 second generations, native 4K detail, and perfect text rendering. You can also edit via natural language, something Midjourney and DALL¬∑E still struggle with. No Discord bots, no complex parameter codes‚Äîjust describe what you need.

q3.question: What can I create with Nano Banana Pro?
q3.answer: Anything‚Äîfrom photo edits and outfit swaps to UI mockups, anime scenes, infographics, or even NotebookLM-ready storyboards. Nano Banana Pro handles realistic, anime, UI/OS, handwriting, abstract, and 3D renders plus video-overview friendly frames. If you can describe it, Nano Banana Pro can visualize it.

q4.question: Will my images look AI-generated or fake?
q4.answer: Nano Banana Pro aims for production realism. Portraits, UI text, and environmental lighting hold up under scrutiny, plus Synth-ID makes it easy to prove authenticity. If something feels off, just iterate‚Äî'soften the smile,' 'swap the sky,' 'make the text bolder'‚Äîand watch the fix apply instantly.

q5.question: What are credits and how do they work?
q5.answer: Credits power Nano Banana Pro generations. 2K images cost 2 credits each, 4K costs 5 credits, and batch runs consume credits per output set. Free previews include daily credits; paid plans layer on 4K access, 10-image bursts, and commercial licensing. Credits never expire.

q6.question: Can I use Nano Banana Pro images commercially?
q6.answer: Yes! Paid plan subscribers receive full commercial licenses for generated images. Use them in marketing, products, videos, prints, NFTs‚Äîanywhere. Free tier images are for personal use only. Always review our terms for specific use cases.

q7.question: How much does Nano Banana Pro cost?
q7.answer: Start Nano Banana Pro free with daily credits. Creator ($19.9/mo) and Pro ($49.9/mo) plans unlock 4K, 10-image bursts, and commercial use. Check our pricing page for the latest plans and features.

q8.question: Is my data private and safe with Nano Banana Pro?
q8.answer: Absolutely. Nano Banana Pro runs on encrypted infrastructure, and we don't store prompts or files without explicit opt-in. Synth-ID watermarks provide invisible attribution, but you retain ownership of every export. Review our privacy policy for the full breakdown.
